items.sentence: I\'m sure Tom will want to take all the credit.
I plan to visit my uncle in Boston this summer.
I think Tom is suggesting that we should leave.
Mary has been arrested for killing her husband.
Mary is a very beautiful and interesting woman.
Mary is cooking stew and Tom is making a salad.
Both Tom and Mary aren\'t very good at cooking.
I don\'t think things will change anytime soon.
We heard the news that you had passed the exam.
We named our only son Tom after my grandfather.
